AudioData.summary: The AudioData interface of the WebCodecs API represents an audio sample.

AudioDataAllocationSize.summary: The allocationSize() method of the interface returns the size in bytes required to hold the current sample as filtered by options passed into the method.
AudioDataAllocationSize.returns: An integer containing the number of bytes needed to hold the samples described by options.

AudioDataAudioData.summary: The AudioData() constructor creates a new object which represents an individual audio sample.

AudioDataClone.summary: The clone() method of the interface creates a new AudioData object with reference to the same media resource as the original.

AudioDataClose.summary: The close() method of the interface clears all states and releases the reference to the media resource.

AudioDataCopyTo.summary: The copyTo() method of the interface copies a plane of an AudioData object to a destination buffer.

AudioDataDuration.summary: The duration read-only property of the interface returns the duration in microseconds of this AudioData object.

AudioDataFormat.summary: The format read-only property of the interface returns the sample format of the AudioData object.

AudioDataNumberOfChannels.summary: The numberOfChannels read-only property of the interface returns the number of channels in the AudioData object.

AudioDataNumberOfFrames.summary: The numberOfFrames read-only property of the interface returns the number of frames in the AudioData object.

AudioDataSampleRate.summary: The sampleRate read-only property of the interface returns the sample rate in Hz.

AudioDataTimestamp.summary: The timestamp read-only property of the interface returns the timestamp of this AudioData object.
